0.entity_description: The physical body of the dead person intended to be protected within the pyramid or tomb.
Dead individuals whose bodies and belongings were placed in tombs for burial.
Dead individual undergoing mummification and burial for the afterlife journey.
Dead individual whose body is buried and who is believed to journey through the afterlife.
Relatives of the deceased person who arrange funerary activities and hire mourners.
Hired specialists who publicly mourn, lead funeral processions, and perform funerary rituals.
The ceremonial movement of mourners and the deceased's remains during the funeral.
Ritual actions performed to honor the deceased as part of burial practices.
The dead individual being honored and buried in ancient Egyptian practices.
Individuals who have died and are the focus of burial practices.

1.entity_description: The value placed on respectfully commemorating and treating dead individuals.
Attitude of honor and respect directed toward those who have died.
